message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm willing to part with it for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product, but I can only afford to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, my budget is still limited. I am willing to offer $15,000 for the product. Could we possibly meet halfway?
